attributes.title: Poop
attributes.review: So as a “RePuBliCaN” I wanted to support the Cheeto of our president🤪BUT when I opened the app there was an orange telling me to “make America great again”??? I was ver confused by this cus honey America was never great. But that’s not all…I think that this is a horror game tbh because this scary image of this scary orange man kept on popping up and it scared the living Jesus out of me😭 anyways I am VERY disappointed and would like to speak to the creator of this app🌸🥰💕

attributes.review: This is for Trump you big fat, white, nasty smelling fat b****. Why you ruining the motherf*****g country wit yo trifling dirty white racist a** big fat b****. Oompa loompa body a** b****. Anyways, horrible app. Don’t recommend.

attributes.title: For our beloved ✨Cheeto Puff ✨
attributes.review: First off when I got the app, it downloaded very quickly, like it wanted me to already be a horrible person. I then decided to make an account just to see what the app had, and maybe for our also beloved 💖 Gen Z 💖 but I got to the point where I put in my name and stuff, but it also asked for my Zip code! Which I don’t think is very necessary for our president cause the government probably already has that, I don’t think he needs to in know city I’m in... overall I also don’t see the point of the app (not being able to even get in). When you open the app and get started, (before all the weird creepy stalker stuff) there is ALREADY shameless self promotion! Saying how you should vote for him! I think that you could download the app just to get your daily does of tea yk, not to mention the self promotion almost made me 🧚🏼‍♀️Gag🧚🏼‍♀️. Everything was normal but right when I opened the app I was... dizzy... dehydrated, looking through other ratings someone else had the same thing! I felt so powerless being a women... it made me want to say.... something terrible..... All lives matter! This made me IMMEDIATELY deleted the app after it told me to do such horrible things!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Crashes and built by orange blob bots.To control your mind and turn you in to a orange blob.

attributes.title: poop!

attributes.review: immediately after opening the app a bunch of spells came up and tarot cards which made my house catch on fire! i no longer have a home and have to be vegan and forced to eat grass! this app caused a downfall.. my life! i am very sad at how this app looks! couldn’t even open it afterwards!

attributes.title: It’s ya Boi
attributes.review: Here because as a starving artist tik tok is a great way for me to build a platform for my unproblematic music. It seems like the only real reason tik tok is in danger in the states is because Trump is butt hurt about his rally. Quit fear mongering to shut out voices that don’t share your views!!
